content.d: Hehe, did you figure it out?
It’s the theme song for the School Idol Rangers!
Correct! It was so fun to perform that play with everyone. You looked like you were having a blast, which reminded me just how much I love your high-energy vibe, Rin-chan!
Ehehe, you’re making me blush! If you’re that happy about it, maybe I should put together another play~
Yeah, do it, do it! I’m still hung up on whether or not Ai-san was a friend or foe at the end of the play!
Sharp as always, Kayo-chin! We left it ambiguous because Ai-san hasn’t decided whether she wants to be a friend or a foe.
Wait... You’re saying it hasn’t been decided if she’s a friend or a foe yet? This is gonna drive me crazy~!
That’ll remain an eternal mystery until Ai-san decides, nya...!
